snippet: The American Civil Liberties Union filed a lawsuit against Georgia on Thursday for denying the Ku Klux Klan’s application to participate in an “adopt a highway” program.
abstract: American Civil Liberties Union Files a lawsuit against Georgia for denying an application from the Ku Klux Klan to participate in an 'adopt a highway' program.
lead_paragraph: The American Civil Liberties Union filed a lawsuit against Georgia on Thursday for denying the Ku Klux Klan’s application to participate in an “adopt a highway” program.

headline.main: Georgia: In Suing State, A.C.L.U. Defends Klan
headline.print_headline: Georgia: In Suing State, A.C.L.U. Defends Klan
